Build my own Website

May 23, 2019

  1. Introduction:

  2. Setting environment:

    Mac installation:

    ruby -v

    gem -v

    gem install jekyll bundler

    jekyll -v

  3. Create a Website:

    jekyll new $name_of_your_website
